pageProduct.name: Redwin Sorbolene Hand Wash with Vitamin E 1 Litre Refill
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Redwin Sorbolene Hand Wash with Vitamin E Refill (SLS Free)

Common Uses

Redwin sensitive skin sorbolene hand wash is the perfect soap free alternative, in a convenient refill bottle. It doesn’t contain the ingredient sodium lauryl sulfate (SLS), a harsh surfactant (cleanser) and known skin irritant for sensitive skin. Its restoring nature locks in moisture whilst gently cleansing hands making it a preferred hand wash for dry and sensitive skin, suitable for the whole family.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Sodium Laureth Sulphate, Ammonium Lauryl Sulphate, Glycerin, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sorbitol, Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate, Cocamide DEA, Sodium Chloride, Glycol Sterate, Tertasodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Triticum Vulare (Wheat Germ) Oil, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone.

Directions

Apply the desired amount onto hands and massage into skin.
